title: Mini-Ep 117: Vacation All We Ever Wanted
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 117: Vacation All We Ever Wanted
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate and Doree reflect on feeling ennui before taking the rest of the week off, and listeners ask about Black-owned mask companies, Bluetooth-enabled kegel exercisers, and whether Kate’s super serum actually smells like dog food. ...
description:
This week, Kate and Doree reflect on feeling ennui before taking the rest of the week off, and listeners ask about Black-owned mask companies, Bluetooth-enabled kegel exercisers, and whether Kate’s super serum actually smells like dog food.

 

Activity: Plan a mental vacation


This episode is sponsored by: 

INKEYLIST -  Visit theinkeylist.com to get started on your own skincare journey.

GRASS ROOTS FARMERS COOPERATIVE - Go to grassrootscoop.com/FOREVER35 for a special, limited time offer of $40 Off, plus Free Shipping!

MIRO - Start collaborating for FREE when you sign up for an account at Miro.com/FOREVER35.  

PURPLE - Go to Purple.com/forever35, and use promo code FOREVER35. For a limited time, you’ll get $150 off any Purple mattress order of $1500 or more!


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
